tag_list: mobile, software, apps, ios-developer, systems, photo, games, social
overview:
Satish is a techie and entrepreneur in his heart and soul. He co-founded Glamour Games, which makes fun mobile apps to create, share and store content.

Prior to co-founding Glamour Games, Satish has been through two acquisitions and has developed a range of apps, including Compare People (20 million peak dau).
